meanings.definition: Having a surface covered with a thin layer of ice, frost, or snow.
meanings.sent1: The crepiest morning greeted us with a shimmering layer of frost on the grass.
meanings.sent2: The crepiest snowfall of the year turned the town into a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent3: Walking on the crepiest ice made me feel like I was skating without skates.
meanings.sent4: The crepiest frost on the window resembled delicate lace curtains.
meanings.sent5: The crepiest snow on the mountain sparkled like a blanket of diamonds.

meanings.definition: Causing a sensation of fear or unease; eerie.
meanings.sent1: The abandoned house had the crepiest atmosphere, sending shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie had the crepiest scenes that made everyone jump in their seats.
meanings.sent3: The crepiest sound in the dark turned out to be just a mouse scurrying around.
meanings.sent4: The crepiest feeling crept up on me as I walked through the dimly lit alley.
meanings.sent5: The crepiest shadow in the room seemed to move on its own, giving me a chill.

meanings.sent1: The fireplace crepiest as the logs burned brightly.
meanings.sent2: The leaves crepiest underfoot as we walked through the autumn forest.
meanings.sent3: The bacon crepiest in the pan, filling the kitchen with a delicious aroma.
meanings.sent4: The campfire crepiest as we roasted marshmallows under the starry sky.
meanings.sent5: The old vinyl record crepiest softly as it played our favorite song.
